channel.title: Reference Management on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Reference Management on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: ResearchMate.pro
item.description: Instantly Extract Insights from Medical Research Papers with ResearchMate.

item.title: Enago Read
item.description: Enago Read is an AI assistant that speeds up the literature review process, offering summaries and key insights to save researchers reading time. It boosts productivity with advanced AI technology and the Copilot feature, enabling real-time questions for deeper comprehension of extensive literature. (It was called RAx.)

item.title: Inciteful
item.description: Find the most relevant literature using graphs and metrics.

item.title: Synthical for Researchers
item.description: Discover, learn, and share research, made easy with our AI.

item.title: Sciencecast
item.description: ScienceCast is a free open-access platform for researchers to disseminate their scientific results and ideas to a wide audience of fellow scientists, journal Editors, grant program managers, and other professionals working at the cutting edge of science and innovation.

item.title: Scholarcy
item.description: The AI-powered article summarizer

item.title: QuillBot
item.description: Toolbox for academic reading and writing

item.title: A.R.I.A. (Aria)
item.description: Aria is Your AI Research Assistant Powered by Large Language Models

item.title: Elicit
item.description: Elicit is a GPT-3 powered research assistant.

item.title: ReadPaper
item.description: A Chinese website for reading, managing, and discussing research papers online.

item.title: Research Rabbit
item.description: Discover and track literature

item.title: PaperPanda
item.description: PaperPanda is a chrome extension to access the PDF files of research papers by automatically searching the web. So our research is not blocked by the paywall.

item.title: PubPeer
item.description: The online journal club of research articles with comments.

item.title: Bibcitation
item.description: Cite your sources in over 9,000 formats and generate automatic citations and works cited for books, websites and journal articles.

item.title: Artigopapers
item.description: Explore scientific, technical, and medical research on Artigo

item.title: Litmaps
item.description: Navigate the literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks and discover science faster

item.title: Paperpile
item.description: Reference manager made by scientists for scientists using modern technology

item.title: SciWheel
item.description: Reference Manager to discover, read, annotate, write and share scientific research

item.title: Endnote Click
item.description: A browser extension to read and download papers for free and legally.

item.title: RAx - Your Personal Smart Research Assistant (Rebranded to Enago Read)
item.description: (Rebranded to Enago Read) Speed up literature analysis and comprehension with RAx. Smart assistant to explore, collate insights and organize your research easily.

item.title: RoamResearch
item.description: Online note-taking with zettelkasten method (connected notes)

item.title: MarginNote
item.description: Efficient and visual note-taking and knowledge management while reading

item.title: Semantic Scholar
item.description: Semantic Scholar uses groundbreaking AI and engineering to understand the semantics of scientific literature to help Scholars discover relevant research.
